      • KaaClientPropertiesState

        public KaaClientPropertiesState(PersistentStorage storage,

      • KaaClientPropertiesState

        public KaaClientPropertiesState(PersistentStorage storage,
                                Base64 base64,
                                KaaClientProperties properties,
                                boolean isAutogeneratedKeys)
        All needed properties for creating Kaa client
        Parameters:
        storage - - in what storage platform will work
        base64 - - interface for Base64 type
        properties - - saved properties for client
        isAutogeneratedKeys - - if not key pair keyPair and true, then create keys. In default it false and used already created keys.
